shortDescription: The objective of this mission is to help rebels to take over the Wallacia. To do this, you will have to get Prime Minister Tate to the Parliament building in the planet capital to get planetary communications under rebels' control.
longDescription: Commander, you will have to fight your way through the Saranak city towards the objective.

contractObjectiveList.title: Ensure that Prime Minister Tate can send the message

objectiveList.title: Scout the Parliament Building
objectiveList.description: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Command Lance
objectiveList.description: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.

objectiveList.title: Capture the Parliament Building with Friendly 'Mechs
objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.

objectiveList.title: Hold Out as Enemies Counter Attack
objectiveList.description: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.

objectiveList.title: Destroy Tara Bradley lance
objectiveList.description: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Fusiliers of Oriente Reinforcements
objectiveList.description: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.

objectiveList.title: Eliminate Base Turrets
objectiveList.description: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.

dialogueContent.words: Commander, you need to get Prime Minister Tate to the Parliament building to send the message.
Fusiliers of Oriente Command lance is defending the building so you will have to get through them.
After that you will need to make sure that the Parliament building is safe while Prime minister Tate sends the message.
We are done here, Commander. I'm ready for extraction.
Damn! Commander, the rebel command won't be happy.
[GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
[GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
Oh hey, just like I said. Turrets. Watch yourself, Commander.
There's the facility, Commander. Move in and neutralize any defenses.
Uh, folks? I just spotted more engine signatures -- 'Mechs powering up. More bad guys are on their way to you, boss.
